original_description: When Peak Time Savings (PTS) Hours begin, automatically turn off specified Philips Hue lights.

trigger_details.title:
Stage
Dropdown list
trigger_details.description: Dropdown list

details.Label: During which event stage do you want this to trigger?
details.Helper text: Allows you to select a specific event stage you want to use or all stages. Precooling is typically triggered an hour before start time.

Event date

Start time

trigger_details.title:

original_description: Toss out that noisy alarm clock and set your Nanoleaf Light Panels to Sunrise mode to wake up gently with a simulated sunrise. Choose the Sunrise scene that ships with your Light Panels when asked to specify a scene and device (or create your own!). Pro tip: works best if you wake up in the same room as your Light Panels =)

original_description: Every time the temperature drops below the value you provide, a Signal will be sent to your Das Keyboard 5Q.

Temperature
